author: LMG Clips
description:
Thanks to our LMG clips sponsors dbrand, Dell, and Secretlab. You can check them out at the links below:

dbrand: https://dbrand.com/pcb
Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke discuss Valve’s surprise rollout of the Steam Frame VR headset, Steam Machine mini-PC, and new Steam Controller. They dive into the Frame’s shockingly good foveated wireless streaming, Valve’s ARM-based standalone approach, SteamOS expansion, and the mixed feelings around the Steam Machine’s expected pricing and longevity.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dnKy4UEdiyo

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane

title: New Valve Announcements Are INSANE!
